Body:
Description: IT IS SHOWING BELOW Message

Your appliance is on critical low disk space, there is only 2.79 gb free available from 40.69 gb (7%). EPP Server functionality and performance may be severely affected. Use Audit Log Backup to reduce the logs stored in the database, delete older system and audit log backups, and tune policies to reduce incoming log count. For further assistance contact Support. You will be automatically logged out in 3 minutes.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Raghavendhar P J K

What We've Learned Updated: Assisted the client along with Adrian through the remote session.
Connected to the backend and removed the mailer file which had a couple of GB along with some older back up files and freed from 90 something % to 72.

Client had a syslog file which had around 12GB that they use to send to their SIEM but they did not want to delete it as they said the issue is on the SIEM side and they want to keep it.

Informed that since the file is too large, it will keep growing if they do not sort the connectivity out.

Client said they will try to sort it out and agreed to keep the ticket opened for another couple of days and they will let us know how it goes.
Next Steps Updated: Follow up with them on Friday.
